thread.title: ICYMI: The Jersey Shore Cast Had A Mini Reunion At Sammi 'Sweetheart' Giancola's 30th Birthday Bash!
thread.title_full: ICYMI: The Jersey Shore Cast Had A Mini Reunion At Sammi 'Sweetheart' Giancola's 30th Birthday Bash!

author: Perez Hilton
title: ICYMI: The Jersey Shore Cast Had A Mini Reunion At Sammi 'Sweetheart' Giancola's 30th Birthday Bash!
text:
3/13/2017 9:37 AM ET | Filed under: MTV ‚Ä¢ Party Poppin' ‚Ä¢ Snooki ‚Ä¢ Jwoww ‚Ä¢ Vinny Guadagnino ‚Ä¢ Reality TV ‚Ä¢ Instagram ‚Ä¢ Nostalgia 
Did we just travel back to 2009?? No, but it sure feels like we did. 
ICYMI, on Saturday, Sammi "Sweetheart" Giancola celebrated her 30th birthday by partying it up with her former Jersey Shore castmates ‚Äî including Nicole "Snooki" Polizzi , Jenni "Jwoww" Farley , Vinny Guadagnino , and Deena Cortese . LOVES it! 
Related: Daria Has Turned 20! 
The MTV celebs reunited at NY hotspot Beautique where they were seen drinking and dancing (with little to no fist pumping). But the Jersey Shore alums were not alone at the party as they were joined by Farley's husband, Roger Mathews ; Deena's fianc√©, Christopher Buckner ; Giancola's podcast cohost Clare Galterio ; MTV spokesman Michael Fabiani ; and famed Bachelor villain Olivia Caridi . 
Now THAT's a party! And the group certainly had a blast as they couldn't stop gushing about their reunion on Instagram . Alongside the group shot (above), Miz Cortese wrote: 
"Reunion ‚ù§with our favorite person from Mtv .. he's our best thing! We love you Fabs üòçüòç" 
However, the pics didn't stop there as Deena and the others also posted: 
Meatballs üçù @snooki A post shared by Deena (@deenanicolemtv) on Mar 12, 2017 at 8:04pm PDT 
Happy birthday @sammisweetheart A post shared by Jenni JWOWW (@jwoww) on Mar 11, 2017 at 7:41pm PST 
These two @rogermathewsnj @vinnyguadagnino A post shared by Jenni JWOWW (@jwoww) on Mar 11, 2017 at 7:52pm PST 
üñ§üçæ A post shared by Nicole "Snooki" Polizzi (@snooki) on Mar 12, 2017 at 10:28am PDT 
A ! And if you're wondering what this crew looks like clubbing these days, don't fret, because we've got video proof for you (below)! 
A post shared by Jenni JWOWW (@jwoww) on Mar 11, 2017 at 7:44pm PST 
Man, oh man. 
Hey guys, feel free to ring us on our duck phone if you ever want to go out sometime. LOLz!
